privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We place great importance on the protection of your personal data, in accordance with the GDPR.
privacy.data_collected_content: We collect data you provide during registration (email, username, encrypted password) and during your use of the service (reviews, reading lists, interactions).
privacy.purpose_content: Your data is used solely to create your account, manage your profile, display your personalized feed, and ensure the proper functioning of the social network.
privacy.cookies_content: Inkgora does not use any advertising cookies or third-party trackers. We only use technical storage mechanisms (JWT/Tokens) strictly necessary for your authentication and session maintenance.
privacy.sharing_content: Your personal data is never sold to third parties. It is stored securely in Europe.
privacy.user_rights_content: In accordance with regulations, you have a right to access, rectify, and delete your data. You can exercise these rights by contacting us at contact@inkgora.com or via your account settings.
